reqs: Note: This is a wait list for GEOG 395, section 201, term 1. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
courseName: Culture, Nature, and Coloniality in Latin America
description: Socio-ecologies in 1491; Spanish colonialism and biological imperialism; contemporary coloniality and neoliberalism; and social movements.
